abort.not_tea_time: Can not re-heat the tea at this time

special_repair.description: This is a special repair created by a preview feature! This demonstrates how Labs features can interact with the Home Assistant repair system. You can disable this by turning off the kitchen sink special repair feature in Settings > System > Labs.
special_repair.title: Special repair feature preview

transmogrifier_deprecated.description: The transmogrifier component is now deprecated due to the lack of local control available in the new API
transmogrifier_deprecated.title: The transmogrifier component is deprecated

unfixable_problem.description: This issue is never going to give up.
unfixable_problem.title: This is not a fixable problem

data_description.int: A longer description for the numeric input

section_1.description: This section allows input of some extra data
section_1.name: Collapsible section

special_repair.description:
Creates a **special repair issue** when enabled.

This demonstrates how Labs features can interact with other Home Assistant integrations.
special_repair.disable_confirmation: This will remove the special repair issue. Don't worry, this is just a demonstration feature.
special_repair.enable_confirmation: This will create a special repair issue to demonstrate Labs preview features. This is just an example and won't affect your actual system.
special_repair.name: Special repair
